GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class GameController
extends javax.swing.JFrame
Since:
1.8.0_301 (Compiler's Version) GameInteraction - It is an Inner Class. It is used to assign the actions to the components when they are triggered by user
Version:
1.8.0_301
Author:
Krushang Patel <041-021-848>, Karnav Panchal <041-022-780>
